name: RunMATLABTests
description: Run all tests in a MATLAB project and generate test artifacts. MATLAB includes any files in your project that have a Test label. If your pipeline does not leverage a MATLAB project, then MATLAB includes all tests in the the root of your repository including its subfolders.
author: The MathWorks, Inc.

inputs.name: codeCoverageCobertura
inputs.label: Cobertura code coverage
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to write code coverage report in Cobertura XML format.

inputs.name: selectByFolder
inputs.label: Test folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the folder used to select test suite elements, relative to the project root folder. To generate a test suite, MATLAB uses only the tests in the specified folder and its subfolders. You can specify multiple folders using a colon-separated or a semicolon-separated list.

inputs.name: selectByTag
inputs.label: Test Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test tag used to select test suite elements. To generate a test suite, MATLAB uses only the test elements with the specified tag.

inputs.name: sourceFolder
inputs.label: Source code folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the folder containing source code, relative to the project root folder. The specified folder and its subfolders are added to the top of the MATLAB search path. To generate a code coverage report, MATLAB uses only the source code in the specified folder and its subfolders. You can specify multiple folders using a colon-separated or a semicolon-separated list.

inputs.name: testResultsJUnit
inputs.label: JUnit-style test results
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to write test results report in JUnit XML format.
